article.description: Isaac Williams scored 24 points, including the winning free throws in overtime and Mississippi Valley State upset Jackson State 70-67 on Saturday.
article.headline: Williams scores 24, MVSU upends Jackson State 70-67 in OT
article.linkText: Williams scores 24, MVSU upends Jackson State 70-67 in OT
article.story: ITTA BENA, Miss. -- Isaac Williams scored 24 points, including the winning free throws in overtime and Mississippi Valley State upset Jackson State 70-67 on Saturday. Yettra Specks and Paris Collins scored back-to-back as Jackson State seemed on the verge of completing a long comeback, taking a four-point lead with 26 seconds left in regulation. But Marcus Romain, 14 points, hit a jumper and a layup off a TaJay Henry steal to knot the game at 63. Williams floated in a layup and Vacha Vaughn added a 3-pointer as the Delta Devils (5-24, 5-11 Southwest Athletic Conference) scored the first five points of OT. Jackson State came roaring back with baskets by Janarius Middleton and Specks. With the lead at 68-67 and time winding down, Williams was fouled and sank both. Specks missed a potential game-tying 3-point attempt at the buzzer. Specks led Jackson State (11-16, 7-8) with 18 points, Collins added 15 and Derek Roscoe 14 with 11 boards. Middleton had 11 points and 13 rebounds. Jackson State is sixth in the SWAC. Ninth-place MVSU has a slim chance of making the eight-team conference tournament.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
